content: Dec 22,  2022ERGO MINING POOL SETUP SERVICES Get your very own ERGO coin mining pool ready & start mining Ergo.We would build an ERGO mining pool for you, on your own server or VPS and you start mining Ergocoin privately with your friends and family without depending on third party mining pools and getting maximum block rewards.Compatible for Mining ERGO with NiceHash/MiningRingRentalsCONTACT USDiscord: goodthebest#6606 Open your Discard and go to Friends and then Add Friend (add goodthebest#6606) and press Send Friend Request button.Telegram: https://t.me/goodthebestEmail:  onlinebuybiz@gmail.comSkype: onlinebuybiz@gmail.com [ add this email in skype search and you will see skype name  theonly-1 ]Bitcointalk PM Click on this link to send a PM directly https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=1782856 [/list]
